definition: "a slave to one's children", hard-working parents who would do everything to ensure their children's well-being, in disregard of their own needs

sentences.english: I wanner say: all the parents are the slaves of raising children.
sentences.chinese: 其实，所有的父母都是“孩奴”。

definition: car slave, sb forced to sacrifice quality of life to buy or maintain a car
(coll.) adults still living with and depending on their parents
(coll.) to live with and depend on one's parents even upon reaching adulthood
fig. unmarried person/single person (especially one who is comfortable financially)
(neologism c. 2017) adult who behaves in a childish manner (e.g. throwing a tantrum)
a slave to one's credit card/sb who is unable to repay their credit card borrowings
debtor (jocular term, homonymous with 富翁[fu4 weng1])
(coll.) (neologism c. 2017, a play on 伏地魔[Fu2 di4 mo2]) woman who devotes herself to supporting her little brother (assisting him with his studies, giving money to help him buy a house etc)
